bibl.title: The Power Struggle of the Diadochoi in Babylon, 323 BC. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. The three stages of the Babylon settlement. - 2. The rejection of Alexander's last plans. - 3. The outcome of the Babylon settlement. - P. 82: Appendix. Overview of the decisions taken in the three stages. - See in part. pp. 66-68: Alexander's funeral; 71-73: Perdikkas and Ptolemaios.
MEEUS Alexander, The Power Struggle of the Diadochoi in Babylon, 323 BC. Avec résumé en anglais.
